title: my missions stuck!?? o.O
body:
Hello summoners. /sorry for my terrible english/
I have the problem with the missions line.  Just after compleating the "last" ..... they stopped.
I dont know why ... but from yesterday I dont get a new missions.
Someone to know something about this problem???? 
http://www.img-share.eu/f/images/374/Bez-imetYSE3oJ.png

replies.body: These completed missions are part of the daily main mission line.  You can expect to see those missions refresh and offer new ones around 11am pacific time.  If you want to add more missions to your arsenal, you can grab a Chaos or Order pass which unlocks a mission chain to complete at your leisure.  I hope that helps!
